title: get gap analysis metrics
description: Verify that the GET /gap_analysis endpoint returns real-time GAP analysis metrics including total tasks, completed, in progress, pending counts, and gap percentage accurately.

title: get tracker app data by phase
description: Test the GET /tracker_app_data endpoint with phase_id parameter to retrieve all tasks with enriched data such as parent, children, and dependencies for the specified phase.

title: update task status
description: Validate the PUT /tasks/{id} endpoint to update a task's status, started_at, and completed_at timestamps, ensuring status transitions are correctly saved and reflected.

title: load milestone tasks for setup wizard
description: Check the GET /tracker_app_data?is_milestone=true endpoint to load milestone tasks correctly for display in the Setup Wizard.

title: save setup wizard configuration
description: Ensure the POST localStorage endpoint saves the Setup Wizard configuration data including business info, infrastructure, financial, and AI models accurately to localStorage.

title: display founder guide content
description: Verify that the GET static_content endpoint returns the complete Founder Guide content with all sections accessible and expandable/collapsible.

title: get tasks for visual gantt chart
description: Test the GET /tasks endpoint to retrieve all tasks required for the Visual Gantt Chart timeline visualization with correct status and scheduling data.

title: get phases for timeline sections
description: Validate the GET /phases endpoint to fetch phase information used to segment the timeline view correctly.

title: get tasks organized by status for kanban board
description: Check the GET /tasks endpoint to retrieve tasks organized by status for display on the Kanban Board columns.

title: update task status on kanban drag drop
description: Test the PUT /tasks/{id} endpoint to update task status when a task card is dragged and dropped between Kanban Board columns, ensuring real-time sync.
